text:
-Son of a bitch,
you set me up

to get me
out of the office.

-Now, you know
what it felt like

last year when you
hung me out to dry.

-Hung you --
I have been bringing you along
for the ride for 10 years!
-You said you were a lion

and I was a flea
in front of everyone.

-It was a negotiating tactic
to get more --

-This firm would be
nothing without me!
We started with two pillars --

entertainment law
and criminal defense.

And everything else
came from there.

But you think it all
comes from you

because you don't respect
what I do.

Well, we'll see
who's more important.

'cause you signed
an agreement giving me the right
to take everyone with me.

-I'm gonna tie you up in court
for years.
-Yeah, if you were gonna sue,

you'd be here
with papers right now.
What is it you really want?

-Litvack, Johnson, and Riley.
-Hell, no.

-Stewart...
-Do you know what I think
of Litvack, Johnson, and Riley?

If they ever left
and started their own firm,

it'd be called lazy,
fat, and stupid.

If I could fire them today,
I would.
But I need their clients.

Those were your words
six months ago.
Well, now I need their clients.
So go ahead and sue.
[ Tense music plays ]

But I know the real reason
you left New York.

And if you sue,
the whole thing comes out.

Now get out of my face.
I got work to do.

-You know what I think
of Litvack, Johnson, and Riley?

If they ever left
 and started their own firm,

it'd be called lazy,
 fat, and stupid.

If I could fire them today,
 I would.
But I need their clients.

-Ted,
I don't know what to say.

-You don't need to say
anything.

Get Johnson and Riley
to get their clients on board

and sign papers with us
by the end of the day.
Okay.
[ Telephone ringing ]

-Leah, get me
Angela Perkins in two minutes.
Tell her it's important.

Look who put his big boy
pants on.
-I have a proposition for you.
I need someone on the inside.

Feed me information
for six months.

Then I name you head
of entertainment.

-Well, who says I won't be
head of entertainment over here?

-That voice inside you
 that knows

Ted will never promote you
 over Rick.
